context_bundle.summary: PAD web automation: Launch Browser (Chrome/Firefox/Edge), Navigate, Click/Populate/Extract elements, Screenshot, Close. HTTP: Invoke Web Service (REST), Download from Web

onboarding.quick_start: Launch Chrome -> Navigate to URL -> Wait for element -> Populate text field -> Click button -> Extract data -> Close browser
common_patterns: Launch new Chrome initial URL:'https://...' window:Maximized -> %Browser%
Navigate to URL 'https://...' wait for load:True
Click link on web page using UI element selector
Populate text field emulate typing:True for dynamic forms
Invoke web service URL:'api/endpoint' method:POST body:'json' -> %Response%
known_errors: Element not found - add Wait for UI element first
Page not fully loaded - increase wait timeout
CORS blocks API calls - use server-side proxy
Browser extension required for some sites
